name: Desktop APP 0.5.4 (Beta Testing)
body:
- [[Fixed issues]]
	- Today's journal file is not recognized by Logseq when starting
	- Can't embed some IFrame links because of `x-frame-options`
	- Handle code block with non-latin1 chars
	- Modal displaying on narrow screens
- [[Enhancement]]
	- Graph view forces
           https://www.loom.com/share/7567e69efa8440cf986c871463586ed3
- [[Nightly]] release!
	- It's unstable compared to the official releases, **use it with caution**!
	- https://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases/tag/nightly

name: Desktop APP Nightly Release 20211217
body:
This is a nightly release of the Logseq desktop app.
It's unstable compared to the official releases, **use it with caution**!

name: Desktop APP 0.5.3 (Beta Testing)
body:
- **Known issue**
	- Some journal pages might not shows up in `Journals` in rare condition, please upgrade to the latest release.
	
- [[Fixed issues]]
	- Horizontal line `---` doesn't work
	- Extra newline in code editor
	- Refine saving of code editor and e2e tests
	- Empty blocks are not hidden
	- Can't collapse a block with body
	- Ignore properties when displaying the block's body
	- Search blank
	- High cpu usage introduced by wrong Excalidraw version

name: Desktop APP 0.5.2 (Beta Testing)
body:
- **Known issue**
	- Some journal pages might not shows up in `Journals` in rare condition, please upgrade to the latest release.
- [[Thanks]]
	- [[Junyi Du]]
		- Enhance WYSIWYG experience of multiline heading
		- fix: DWIM isn't activated at one-line block
		- enhance: only apply DWIM to list item when cursor at EOL
	- [[Devon Zuegel]]
		- Improvements to Settings
		- enhance: improve alert for "a new version has been downloaded"
		- refactor: hard-coded colors -> CSS variables for header tips
		- enhance: tidy up repo dropdown in sidebar
		- fix: handle windows path in shorten-repo-name
		- fix: make Continue? modals more consistent
		- feat: add "add to / remove from favorites" to command palette
			- Shortcut: `Cmd+Shift+F`
		- enhance: color code SRS buttons & extract shortcut to tippy
	- [[Bad3r]]
		- Updated README E2E Testing Instructions
		- Enhance: add waring for clear cache
		- Helping a lot in the community!
	- [[ahonn]]
		- feat: keep indent after copy block refs
	- [[Peng Xiao]]
		- fix: queryElementById type
	- [[Vladimir Sorokin]]
		- Added Russian translation
	- [[Moritz Ulrich]]
		- follow-link-under-cursor!: Add page to 'Recent' list
		- Always add target of `redirect-to-page!` to 'Recent' list.
- [[Fixed issues]]
	- Code block are not saved
	- Empty block not deleted when there's new file detected from #data-safety
	- Wrong indentation for both templates and copied selections
	- Avoid cyclical refs and deep refs
	- Cut a block doesn't copy its nested children blocks
	- Switching between code block to text editing will cause leading spaces not rendered
	- #tag query doesn't work
	- Handle encryption errors
	- Local graph should popup encryption dialog when re-index
	- Wrong link href for file links #[[Org Mode]]
	- Add .svg to image ext
	- Display user-defined drawer
	- Automatic jump back when click 'prev' in a long page
	- Problem keeping separate graphs separated
	- Logbook disappears when block got embedded
- [[Enhancement]]
	- Reduce start time from minutes to seconds for large graphs (tested on 10k Markdown files)
	- Type ``` and press Enter to switch to codemirror mode
	- New [[Shortcuts]]
		- `g a` to all pages
		- `g g` to graph view
		- `g f` to open flashcards
	- Move editing into the center of viewport when out of viewport
	- Disable spell check on electron by default
- [[Breaking Changes]]
	- `:block/title`, `:block/body` and `:block/unordered` are removed from the database schema to reduce both memory usage and start time
		- Re-index is needed!
		
Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/14067234-cd43-40d8-9e25-26d2ba75a0a9

name: Android Alpha Testing
body: Fix: app crash on Android 10

name: Android Alpha Testing
body:
Logseq Android is out!

Mobile shares same codebase with desktop version, so use it as same as on desktop!
However, the PDF annotation, Plugin System are not available on mobile for now, we need some work to copy them to mobile.

name: Desktop APP 0.5.1 (Beta Testing)
body:
- [[Fixed issues]]
	- Changes are not saved to files when using Logseq and OneDrive on multiple computers
		- **We strongly encouraged you to upgrade to the latest version to avoid any data loss.**
	- Markdown blockquote syntax parsing not backwards compatible
	- `Contents` is not considered a "Built-in page" for Graph view

name: Desktop APP 0.5.0 (Beta Testing)
body:
- [[Nov 24th, 2021]]
	- [[Thanks]]
		- [[Gabriel Horner]]
			- Add datalog console extension in dev
			- Fix GitHub CI
		- [[David Whittington]]
			- Support #Arweave URLs for links and images
		- [[Peng Xiao]]
			- Custom macro click issue
	- [[Fixed issues]]
		- [[Windows]] desktop app is finally signed
		- Clean block's referenced old orphaned pages when saving it
		- Can't open a new graph on Linux
		- Git Autocommit not working
		- Can't open external links like Zotero and mail clients
		- Don't create empty pages for alias and tags page properties
		- Auto-complete doesn't valish after /current time
		- Slow parsing on base64 image link
		- Query filters like `and`, `or` are case sensitive
		- Can't rename pages with nested titles
		- Remove space when showing template popup
		- All Pages view lists all of the images
		- Sometimes shortcuts stopped working
		- `[[` doesn't trigger auto-complete for non-english input methods
	- [[Enhancement]]
		- Convert highlighted word to a link when pasting a url
		- Save a backup file to `logseq/bak` if writes failed (EBUSY lock)
		- Separate plugins and themes in the marketplace
		- Create today's page when redirect to the home or scrolling to the top of journals
		- Jump to the end of page ref after pressing Enter
		- Avoid press enter at empty page-ref

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/619e5440-72c1-4d04-bf4b-dd911f1c69b3

name: Desktop APP 0.4.9 (Beta Testing)
body:
Fixed:
1. Empty graph view
2. Shortcuts can be repeated sometimes

name: Desktop APP 0.4.8 (Beta Testing)
body:
Fixed:

1. Empty graph view
2. Delete key is deleting 2 characters rather than 1

name: Desktop APP 0.4.7 (Beta Testing)
body:
- [[Nov 18th, 2021]]
	- [[Thanks]]
		- [[Devon Zuegel]]
			- Enhance shortcut tooltips
	- [[Fixed issues]]
		- Rename page references when merging pages
		- Code block indentation
		- Block id not persisted when copy block embed
		- Linked references missing in the right sidebar
		- Make sure blocks have the same format when dragging to another page
		- Check for update
	- [[Enhancement]]
		- Toggle displaying shortcut tooltips on settings
		![CleanShot 2021-11-18 at 10 33 24](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/142341573-49b84cb0-196e-43da-b380-a696a6b652f3.png)
		- Display a warning if a block's content include multiple lists or headings
	- [[Breaking Changes]]
		- Deprecate both Ctrl/Cmd+u for searching and  `Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+u` for search in page, use `Ctrl/Cmd+k` and `Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+k` instead.

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/8590ee9b-3f85-40cc-954d-857715503802

name: Desktop APP 0.4.6 (Beta Testing)
body:
- [[Nov 16th, 2021]]
  **Beta 0.4.6**
  Desktop app download link: https://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases/tag/0.4.6
	- [[Thanks]]
		- [[Devon Zuegel]]
			- Add more content-aware classes to textarea for a more WYSIWYG experience
			- Show default home instead of journals in side bar
			- Polish cards
			- Rename "page emoji" to "page icons"
				- This PR renames the page property `emoji` to `icon`, which is a more typical and more flexible name.
		- [[Peng Xiao]]
			- Add page & block ref to search item
			- Add back haschild attribute
	- [[Fixed issues]]
		- Navigating to a page through search caused Logseq to crash to a blank screen
		- Rename page should delete the old page name from search
		- Graphs disappeared (not data-loss) after restarting the app
		- Backspace can't move to previous block if it's a embed block
		- Cycle todos will not deselect the blocks
		- Git still commits even if it's toggled off on settings
		- Pages with "." in the title do not show Hierarchy at the bottom
		- Line starting with - will be disappear after exit editing
		- Cannot edit deadline/schedule using date picking panel
		- Ordered list can't be shown in reference list
		- Drag and Drop inconsistently not working
		- Alt-dragging a bullet to an indented position will create multiple empty bullet
		- Import JSON from Roam has trouble with certain code block syntax
		- No more auto-complete if the cursor moves back to [[]]
		- Empty path when importing roam's json
		- Renaming namespace page will update all its children's links
		- Page-ref replacement if non-slash in path
	- [[Enhancement]]
		- Merging pages when renaming one page to the name of another page
		- Add copy block embed(s)
		- Delay query for linked references
			- Editing the main page should be fast no matter how many linked references it has
		- Cycle todos support cmd+enter
		- Display a warning if config.edn is invalid
		- Don't add another set of (()) when copy block ref to embed
		- Remove built-in properties from search result
		- When depth level > 3, the breadcrumb displays an ellipsis

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/38a7f160-5dbb-4ab0-8556-5e45cd15144a

name: Desktop APP 0.4.5 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:

Features:
- Move selected blocks up/down (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + UP/DOWN)
https://www.loom.com/share/b737ddbd59da4d4f95769a0b072d40ee
- `custom.js` support

Enhance:
- `All pages` support batch delete, search, journals filter and remove orphaned pages
![CleanShot 2021-10-23 at 00 18 04](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/138489122-16a89d33-77b3-43aa-9e3c-fa9c1f4c71e1.png)
- Persist right sidebar state
- Click to edit should jump to the end of inline emphasis and links
- Make [[DWIM]] optional
- `g t` to go to tomorrow's page, `g p` to go to the previous journal, `g n` to go to the next journal, `o d` to open file in directory, `o f` to open file with default app (Contributed by Devon)
- Page suggestion will not allow you to deny the suggestion
- Custom editor command trigger

Fixed:
- Failed to import roam research's json
- Both `Copy as` and `Export page` should be fast now
- Display the below plus button when zoom in
- Several issues when renaming namespace pages
- Marking task from "Now" to "Done" lost tracking time duration data
- Timetracking support seconds now
- Logbook related issues
- Files not saved when onboarding if canceled the file picker
- Encrypted page for revert history version by git
- Decrypt file content when diff

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/45fc2d43-4154-4f20-ad60-c3039e35256d

name: Desktop APP 0.4.4 (Beta Testing)
body:
Fixed issues:
- Can't open graph on Linux
- Performance degradation
- Favorite when renaming page's title
- Undo need multiple steps (inserting new block)
- Recent not working 
- Url can include `{` and `}` now

DWIM (Do What I Mean) example:
https://www.loom.com/share/e778bce53b964d1a8a980aba22fc1cd3

name: Desktop APP 0.4.3 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Left sidebar
- Click title to rename the page
- Open the first block when opening a new page by Mod+o
- Added both `Copy block refs` and `Cycle todos`
- DWIM (do what I mean) for `Enter` key when editing. Contributed by @llcc
Context-awareness of `Enter` key makes editing more easily.

Fixed issues:
- Data loss when dragging blocks to empty pages
- Broken block references
- Importing from Roam has issues with illegal filenames (Windows)
- Cards wrong number during the review
- Page rename doesn't work for case-sensitive pages
- Respect the original page's name in the block content
- A block can be collapsed only when it has children or its body is not empty

![CleanShot 2021-10-08 at 21 13 41](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/136563435-e2920aee-fbea-4b05-b2db-cfdbddd7dbe6.png)

https://www.loom.com/share/5fd05d33377c4254b4ee4b6aae5b193d

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/2c01a84b-d944-4755-bed4-6ff079465567.

name: Desktop APP 0.4.2 (Beta Testing)
body:
## Logseq mobile app volunteers (help needed) 🎉 🎉 
You can join by filling this short form https://forms.gle/SvH19XvRQ8w49NTm6.

## Some highlights:
[[Features]]
- Add a shortcut `Cmd+Shift+y` to insert youtube timestamp
- Add `(sample n)` to pick random query results

[[Fixed issues]]
- Broken advanced commands triggered by `<`
- Can't edit embed blocks
- Remove `:` from bak file names (windows reserved chars)
- Highlight not working in org mode
- Don't trigger commands auto-complete when pasting
- Two of the same query with mixed syntax causes hanging
- Correct position of query command hint
- Cloze not shown

[[Enhancement]]
- Smooth transition for the right sidebar
- Unify both block and page export
- Better bottom actions on Web mobile

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/3c12d46c-cd46-4225-83d8-9f660d525216

name: Desktop APP 0.4.1 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- [[Fixed issues]]
- Can't edit code block #Codemirror
- Review cards button not working
- Search not working when publishing
- Smooth auto-complete for `/` commands
- Cards command not working in commands palette
- `Ctrl/Cmd+l` (insert link) doesn't work on Web
- block reference with a deadline has a redundant new line
- [[Enhancement]]
- Display query examples when invoking /query
- Don't group by pages if there's `:result-transform`
- New [[Configuration]] option `:shortcut/doc-mode-enter-for-new-block?`
- By default, pressing `Enter` in the document mode will create a new line.
Set this to `true` so that it's the same behavior as the usual outliner mode.

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/3f1db344-81af-4f15-8fe2-36e03e0cf279

name: Desktop APP 0.4.0 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Fullscreen image support
- Search UX improvement
- Performance improvement for pages with a lot of linked references.
  A new option `:ref/linked-references-collapsed-threshold` was added to control when to collapse all the linked references. The default value is `50`.
- Save database cached files to a new directory called `logseq/bak` when logseq detects file modifications from the disk.
  This fixed some issues when using Logseq with other editors like Emacs, Obsidian, etc.
- Disable git auto commit by default
`Git` caused some trouble when using with some sync services like iCloud/OneDrive/Dropbox, if you encountered any issues related to Git, you're encouraged to disable the git auto-commit on `Settings > Version Control`.
- Support hh:mm:ss youtube timestamp format

Fixed issues:
- Can't parse encrypted graphs
- Open the last block when inserting template blocks
- Open the previous block when deleting selected blocks
- Clear text selection when blocks are selected

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/614b36ce-adeb-423d-8b04-3aaac9086268.

Search UX improvement:
https://www.loom.com/share/b7c234535aa8439398a97c595f46f46c

name: Desktop APP 0.3.9 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Initial plugins marketplace support! You need to enable the developer mode to use it
- Youtube timestamp support
- Queries support `namespace` pages, e.g. `{{query (namespace [[term]])}}` will returns pages start with `term/`
- Add instruments for changes that can't be saved to disk
- Code block not saved
- Can't change the case of a page name
- Git not included on Windows
- Don't overwrite today's journal page if the synced file is empty or its content equals to the default journal template

Marketplace demo:
https://www.loom.com/share/995d6755b29c48c6b610646736aa5049

Youtube timestamp demo:
![2021-09-13 21 53 53](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9002575/133096658-67e3d6da-4444-4c06-b904-823e2206fd71.gif)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/c66501ed-6d79-4a12-83d2-040da508697b

name: Desktop APP 0.3.8 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some Highlights:
- Fixed several issues that lead to data loss especially with cloud services like iCloud/OneDrive/GDrive, etc.
- Fixed several issues when running git on Windows
- Linked reference is not refreshed after file altering
- Page history support reverting
- Display logbook for scheduled tasks
- Fixed not showing spent hours for logbook
- More consistent with orgmode style
- Shortcut && Settings Portuguese translation
- Calc understand percentages
- Fixed data-refs / data-refs-self regression
- Add alerts before both refresh and re-index
- Detect file changes when starting the desktop app

How to revert a page (gif)?
https://www.loom.com/share/5c21a8a3470c4fd7bb9190a188d88b71

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/cd5be27c-e2d6-4145-8c06-ed6ace8171df

name: Desktop APP 0.3.7 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- `cmd(ctrl)+shift+p` for new command palette
- Better workflow to resolve "The file has been modified on your local disk" alert.
When Logseq detects file modified on your disk and diverged from your actual Logseq page content, it'll prompt you to choose which one would you like to keep.
- Better task management & time tracking with logbook [[Clocking]] support
- Zotero overwrite mode
- Fixed several shortcut ux issues
![image](https://logseq.github.io/assets/command-palette-demo_1630478135142_0.gif)
![image](https://logseq.github.io/assets/diff-demo_1630479484172_0.gif)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/613064a5-f57d-458e-b8b3-14797c8c384c
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9002575/131790184-496ff28f-2f7e-4c1c-b9e6-c284b8c87e40.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.3.6 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Page version history support, your notes are much safer now!
- Automatic backup with Git
- Cmd/Alt+! to run raw git commands
- Replace block reference with either text or block embed
- Drawers support
- Graph antialiasing and labels dark style
- File changes from the disk are not refreshed immediately in logseq
- Avoid false alert of "the file has been modified from the disk..."
- Fix org mode `:tag:` issue
- Add breadcrumbs for srs cards

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/fd6a5fdc-3e47-4399-aaeb-6297be9f2285

https://www.loom.com/share/62fe1f6026ce4966bc88b3f3663e1649

![CleanShot 2021-08-27 at 21 50 05](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/131137723-411d0f95-42aa-4989-a1fd-fc1e53a79a35.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.3.5 (Beta Testing)
body:
- fix app crashes on Mac
- codemirror support both sparql and turtle modes

name: Desktop APP 0.3.4 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Parsing speed up by leveraging web workers. Adding or reindexing large graph is now much faster!
- Ability to edit SRS cards during the review
- Add disable spellcheck option setting for the desktop app.
- Make local pdf asset file as relative path in pdf hls annotation file
- Add [[Zotero]] `Linked Attachment Base Directory` setting for users with Zotfile workflow and using relative attachment links
- Improved `open` button to open [[Zotero]] attachment file using relative link instead of absolute link. 
- Zotero setting profile support. 
- Support markdown url link format `[Link caption](<url>)`
- Add Portuguese translation

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/611e698b-c30b-4b51-be56-703524d963a6
![CleanShot 2021-08-19 at 23 04 02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/130092700-39aaad4e-2bb3-42fb-88d4-bd3f32ca9d94.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.3.3 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Add Norwegian (bokmål) translation thanks to @ingepettersen 
- feat: Copy selected blocks as text/HTML/OPML
- feat: PDF support linked references for highlights
- feat: Direct Zotero(including zotfile) attachments support
- fix: Serious bug in naming the journal md files
- fix: Page auto-complete search can clear the editing block
- fix: Inconsistent timestamps on pages
- fix: Failed to drag or paste images
- fix: Page blank with invalid block ids
- fix: PDF links can't be opened

![2021-08-12 20 37 27](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/129200161-4e84a762-afd6-44af-8add-a928f1ff553b.gif)

![CleanShot 2021-08-12 at 20 53 30](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/129200052-ab196a3a-a7aa-4d9f-9049-08e5ff2d54ff.png)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/5473b972-e358-46eb-ae13-fa2ae1dd41bb

name: Desktop APP 0.3.2 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- PDF annotation! 
gif demo: https://logseq.github.io/assets/2021-08-06_21.46.20_1628257857150_0.gif
- fix nested templates
- fix reindex crash with custom date format

![CleanShot 2021-08-06 at 22 06 52](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/128522750-56522a25-e99c-466a-a9d6-01697a183c3b.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.3.1 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
1. Performance should be much better when editing long pages
2. Jump to alias's source page when searching
3. Remove key from the page title #zotero 
4. PDF attachment link not working #zotero 
5. Static export fails silently if an asset is missing
6. Block gets removed on a new line when preview (only for the newly generated journal page)
7. `default-templates` support named template for new journal pages

![CleanShot 2021-08-03 at 22 45 48](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/128035985-dc32b0a7-3ce6-44ea-bca1-5dec82f2115c.png)
Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/5522d7d5-2c1a-4d97-9c0d-5d4a74d29bd4

name: Desktop APP 0.3.0 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
1. Zotero integration! 🎉 🎉
    Type `/zotero` to start!
![zotero-search_1627554650388_0](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/127660237-4b30f350-ed1f-48b5-86cc-615654355802.gif)

2. Support `==` for highlight in Markdown
3. Add `/Embed Twitter` support! (by @pengx17)
4. Fixed broken block references after refreshing
5. Fixed page references not working as linked ref in page's properties
6. Fixed Backspace will remove the whole block when block timestamps was enabled
7. Group blocks query result by the same path
8. [[Query/table]] persists sort options (sort-by, desc/asc)
9. Block timestamps was deleted to avoid countless rare cases

![CleanShot 2021-07-30 at 21 31 41](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/127660378-fbe84848-2db0-4673-ad01-c02146ae35e0.png)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/f65e2408-643d-43af-9320-57f1076847d5

name: Desktop APP 0.2.10 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
1. Long pages should be loading faster
2. Query results support both nested children and breadcrumbs
3. Both `^^` and `__` can be auto paired when there's selected text
4. Fixed crashing when auto-complete some page references
5. Fixed copy && paste not working well on Windows
6. Fixed Org-mode id links
7. Add block-level HTML export
![CleanShot 2021-07-26 at 23 57 18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/127020575-b49ddc17-a588-4b51-a150-299e0eabd71e.png)
8. Fixed can't create today's journal page.

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/4d0c3c40-a21d-41f2-8c89-091aec2a416a

name: Desktop APP 0.2.8 (Beta Testing)
body:
![CleanShot 2021-07-24 at 00 09 34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/126810667-f4613de4-372b-43f2-befc-36be492252a6.png)
Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/48e76d46-3419-455c-84a0-349b80e369b8

name: Desktop APP 0.2.7 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Add Cards (srs flashcards) support 🎉 🎉
![cards](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/126658742-90d7a550-be66-45d3-85fd-b864e253e86e.gif)
- Delete pages shall not show up in search
- Org mode title not parsed if file-level property block exist in file
- Hide bullets when the block is empty (non-editing mode)
- Copy includes block references and embeds

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/2397b650-2828-48f9-b51e-320565c847fb

name: Desktop APP 0.2.6 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Calculator supports negative numbers now 🪄  (contributed by @bensu)
- Fixed can't drag the desktop app 
- Fixed can't go back to global search after searching in a specific page
- Don't show properties in block references
- Block timestamps in the code block
- Query tables support custom attributes and sorting by any property
- `Query table function` (by triggering `/function`)
![2021-07-19 21 19 52](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/126168865-6d8e3ac6-03bb-4ec2-a974-71b5ca24dd12.gif)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60f57103-7fe8-4b83-b497-f3576672d30b
![CleanShot 2021-07-19 at 21 41 42](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/126169207-c259f052-03ef-4148-8a22-7563f945c091.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.2.5 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Fixed data loss issue introduced by 0.2.4
- Finally, queries can be rendered as either tables or lists! 🎉
![2021-07-14 23 00 58](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/125644946-760093e1-ab40-4601-a7f2-dd46ecea43a8.gif)
- Block timestamps are brought back! It's disabled by default, you can enable it on the settings page
- Page timestamps are added now, "All pages" support sorted by page's name, links, created at and updated at
![CleanShot 2021-07-14 at 23 05 07](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/125645502-041b066d-2328-4b5f-9a44-ac71c15f2ca9.png)

- fixed block reference gets lost on alt-dragged blocks after re-index
- preserve the block properties order
- Publishing supports subpath and many enhancements

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60eef6a9-ad06-4a3e-99eb-7b093336ae68

name: Desktop APP 0.2.3 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:

1. Graph display is completely revamped, fast rendering, better search and filtering experience
![ezgif-1-fa4c8d1b3676](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/125103042-86a9d180-e10e-11eb-88e6-ee47f609f74d.gif)

2. `[[]]` page search autocomplete now comes with page preview, contributed by @pengx17  
3. You can now right-click a block bullet and export a single block as text or opml
4. Better document mode for writing experience
5. New frameless design for desktop mac

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9002575/125055439-c73b2800-e0d9-11eb-97b8-850e54d32096.png)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60e81184-6ec6-46fe-8456-5bb2480ab32c

name: Desktop APP 0.2.2 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
1. public pages not exported when publishing
2. images not working
3. dragging files might create duplicated files
4. @bensu allow numbers to have commas in `calculator`

![CleanShot 2021-06-29 at 23 26 46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/123825466-8270fd80-d931-11eb-8d59-e8e38c9fc6aa.png)

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60db3824-3728-458b-b7e1-ed359c275d96

name: Desktop APP 0.2.1 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
1. Namespace pages now display with hierarchy
2. @devonzuegel polished and refactored setting and shortcut UI
3. @bensu fixed codemirror click issue and improved calc parsing 
4. Fixed link syntax behavior
  `![label](url)` will display pdf preview (desktop app) or image
  `[label](url)` only display as a clickable label
5. Fixed some exported markdown with the wrong format
6. New command `paste-text-in-one-block-at-point` (mod+shift+v) will paste multi-paragraph text in clipboard as one block
7. Display pdf by default

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60d9d3c5-58ec-4ec8-ac4f-13133db9519c

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9002575/123662619-39a14200-d868-11eb-9af0-de00c1ebbf0a.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.2.0 (Beta Testing)
body:
Some highlights:
1. Alt-dragging to create a block reference
2. Open the second level children by default for linked references
3. Customize shortcuts UI support
4. `Ctrl+Shift+r` to replace a block reference at the point with its text (editing mode)
5. @devonzuegel added `/calculator` slash command
6. @andrevem added Spanish translation
7. @pengx17 added both breadcrumbs and block children in preview

Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60d3353a-8999-4186-adcc-1f99b0f71560

![CleanShot 2021-06-23 at 21 50 11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/123108445-037d5000-d46d-11eb-9787-f46077f2274a.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.1.9 (Beta Testing)
body: Some highlights: 1. Markdown supports nested headings 2. Roam Research JSON export 3. @pengx17 wrote a plugin template at https://github.com/pengx17/logseq-plugin-template-react 4. @xyhp915 made a plugin for Reddit hot news ![demo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/122451053-4d33e980-cfda-11eb-8b47-3c9a4afcedc5.gif) Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60cb89fb-1518-471d-8ec2-f41a634bea70

We have some short tutorials too, check https://logseq.github.io/#/page/plugins%20101

name: Desktop APP 0.0.4 (Alpha Testing)
body:
Full changelog at https://logseq.github.io/#/page/60a518bb-479a-49a3-95ee-293b7c693c18

How to migrate to the new md syntax that logseq support?
1. Back up all your notes first!!
2. Click the right three dots menu, go to "Export" and select Convert Markdown headings to unordered lists (# -> -)
Open Canary and link to your current notes location -> click 3 dots ->  Export -> Convert Markdown headings to unordered lists (# -> -). This will create a zip file of your current notes, extract to your desired location, and refresh Canary (3 dots -> All Graphs -> Open desired directory -> wait for loading to finish.
Notice: Since Logseq is using - unordered list for bullets, - will not work as a list item anymore, replace - with * if you need it. The converter doesn't convert it automatically because it might break your contents.
![CleanShot 2021-05-19 at 23 25 16](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/118841857-42166c80-b8fb-11eb-8a9a-a0aac932d4e4.png)

name: Desktop APP 0.0.2 (Alpha Testing)
body:
- Fixed almost all the bugs reported on version `0.0.1`
- Add the markdown converter support
**How to migrate**
1. Back up all your notes first!!
2. Click the right three dots menu, go to "Export" and select `Convert Markdown headings to unordered lists (# -> -)`
Open Canary and link to your current notes location -> click 3 dots ->  Export -> `Convert Markdown headings to unordered lists (# -> -)`. This will create a zip file of your current notes, extract to your desired location, and refresh Canary (3 dots -> All Graphs -> Open desired directory -> wait for loading to finish.
Notice: Since Logseq is using `-` unordered list for bullets, `-` will not work as a list item anymore, replace `-` with `*` if you need it.
Unfortunately, the converter doesn't convert it automatically because it might break your contents.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/117576253-cc025080-b117-11eb-8cc1-9cf0051e0fa6.png)
![2021-05-10 23 34 39](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/479169/117686253-43ec7b80-b1e9-11eb-8fb8-7e6762f04a3b.gif)

name: Desktop APP 0.0.6 (Alpha Testing)
body:
## [[Feb 2nd, 2021]] 
**Version 0.0.6**
[[Desktop app]] download link:
https://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases/tag/0.0.6
### [[Fixed Issues]]
- Fix assets can't be opened if there're non-ascii chars
- Add slide support to desktop app
- Fix footnotes not working
- Fix both preferred workflow and preferred format settings not working
- Fix `/` commands list is empty
- Add windows menubar

name: Desktop app 0.0.5.3 (alpha testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Added Mac M1 support
- Fix daily journals can't be created automatically 
- Fix Inline tags can't be clickable
- Fix recent pages can't be open in the main view
- Fix block references not updated when the source text changed
- Fix can't found code-editor.js on desktop

name: Desktop app 0.0.5.2 (alpha testing)
body:
Some highlights:
- Logseq will load new files automatically, no need to reload yourself
- no need to always asking the directory write permission every time when you open the app
- drag && drop any files, you can click the link to open the file with your default app.

name: Publishing
body: See docs at https://logseq.github.io/page/publishing.
